Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm.utilities

Record Class DynamicChecker<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
net.tangly.fsm.utilities.DynamicChecker<O,S,E>
Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - the state enumeration type uniquely identifying a state in the state machine
E - the event enumeration type uniquely identifying the event sent to the state machine
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateMachineEventHandler<O,S,E>
public record DynamicChecker<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>(StateMachine<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>> fsm) extends Record implements StateMachineEventHandler<O,S,E>
The finite state machine dynamic checker verifies the correctness of a state machine description. The following rules are applied.
  • Only one transition is eligible upon processing of an event otherwise the state machine behavior is undefined because the machine is not deterministic as expected in hierarchical Harel state machines.
  • No exception should be thrown during the processing of a condition or an action.

For each violation an illegal state exception will be thrown.
